description: A range of office chairs to suit all budgets including task chairs, meeting room chairs and cantilever chairs.  Our ergonomically designed office seating provides both quality and value for money. The stylish yet comfortable chairs are available in a choice of fabrics and leathers to complement your office interiors. All items which contain foam and/or fabric are CRIB 5 Certified unless otherwise stated. Most items require basic self assembly.
